amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to make permanent pension plan and individual retirement account arrangements and include corporate tax and executive compensation provisions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute to insert a complete new text which modifies the existing bill but retains the provisions making permanent the pension provisions contained in the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act (Public Law 107-16).

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Neal.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neal amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 182 - 204 (Roll no. 246).
